root.name: Deadpool
root.description: OverviewDeadpool is a video game being developed by High Moon Studios starring the Marvel comics character Deadpool which will be voiced by award winner Nolan North. A psychotic lunatic known for breaking the fourth wall in the comics he appears in, it's almost assured that similar metahumor will fill the game.PlotThe story is set with Deadpool accepting a mission to assassinate news reporter Chance White. The plot also involves Mister Sinister who is scouring a former mutant haven called Genosha for new DNA to use in his armies.
